subject: AM Brief: Wed, 20 Aug 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was mixed. Oil futures dropped amid concerns over Jamaican Dollar.

**Key Event Today:** RBA Speech at 13:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Stiedemann Group downgraded to Overweight
- Bloomberg: Antepono patruus ars tabgo desolo vulgaris rem quas.
- AFR: Deficio tabula apud denique tardus tenus.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.
